settings.title: Where Every Pixel Tells a Story
settings.content:
The Divoom Pixoo-64 allows you to create digital art and decorate your home the way you like. This cutting-edge 10.3-inch pixel art display not only brightens your space but also brings your ideas to life through its vibrant 64x64 LED panel.

Whether it's creating stunning pixel art, tracking social media engagement, or enhancing your gaming atmosphere, the Pixoo-64 is designed to do it all with flair and precision.

settings.title: From Artistic Inspiration to Technological Innovation
settings.content: Inspired by pixel art's emotional impact, our developers envisioned a dynamic, interactive canvas that merges creativity with real-time connectivity, leading to the creation of the Pixoo-64.

settings.title: The Result: A Versatile Masterpiece
settings.content:
Today, the Pixoo-64 is not just a product but a community enhancer. It connects users worldwide, enabling them to share their creations and celebrate milestones.

Whether it’s lighting up a gaming room, adding flair to a studio, or serving as a dynamic tool for influencers to engage with their audience, the Pixoo-64 has become a symbol of how technology can enhance our interactions with the world around us.

settings.title: Personalized Wake-Up Calls
settings.content: Begin your mornings with custom messages, the day’s weather, or your schedule displayed in lively pixel art.

settings.title: Social Media Notification
settings.content:
Receive instant visual alerts for messages on your favorite social media apps, ensuring you never miss important updates.

Watch your follower count rise in real time. Celebrate every new subscriber or follower with a dynamic visual that updates instantly.

settings.title: Artistic Freedom in Your Hands
settings.content: With the Divoom app, create stunning visuals or animations that express your mood, message, or mission. Whether you're a novice or a seasoned pixel artist, the Pixoo64 is your canvas.

settings.title: Dynamic Decor
settings.content: Sync with movies and games for an enhanced experience.

settings.title: Immersive Entertainment
settings.content: Customize your living space or office with artwork that matches your interior design or sets the mood for your next big event.

settings.title:
Unlock a world of endless features
Pixoo 64
Dynamic LED Panel
settings.content: At the heart of the Pixoo-64 is its robust 64x64 pixel LED screen, which boasts 4096 lamp beads for clear and vibrant visual display. This high-resolution screen brings your pixel art and digital data to life with stunning clarity and color accuracy.

settings.title: Versatile Connectivity Options
settings.content: Equipped with both WiFi and Bluetooth capabilities, the Pixoo-64 ensures seamless connectivity. Whether it's updating art from the cloud or syncing data for display, these features allow for easy and efficient operation right from your smartphone or tablet.

settings.title: Comprehensive Control via Mobile App with Integrated Smart Features
settings.content:
The Divoom mobile app is the command center for the Pixoo-64. From here, users can choose from a vast gallery of pre-designed patterns, create their own designs, or use the app to adjust settings such as brightness and contrast. The app also facilitates community interaction, letting users share their creations and gain inspiration from others globally.

Beyond just a display, the Pixoo-64 serves as a functional hub for your daily needs. It includes a microphone for music synchronization, which allows the display to pulse and change with the beat, adding an extra layer of interaction to your favorite tunes.

Tailor everything from brightness to content display according to your needs. Whether it's lighting up a dark corner, setting the mood for a party, or getting live updates on your gaming achievements, the Pixoo-64 adapts to your lifestyle.

Beyond just a display, the Pixoo-64 serves as a functional hub for your daily needs. It includes a microphone for music synchronization, which allows the display to pulse and change with the beat, adding an extra layer of interaction to your favorite tunes.

settings.title: Durable and Portable
settings.content: Crafted to be as robust as it is beautiful, the Pixoo-64 is lightweight and compact, making it easy to move from room to room or even take with you to events.

settings.title: USB Power Supply
settings.content: Keeping convenience in mind, the Pixoo-64 is powered via USB, making it easy to set up and use anywhere. This energy-efficient setup ensures that your display can remain active without running up the electricity bill, whether it’s lighting up your gaming room or adding a personalized touch to your office.

settings.title: Financial Traders and Investors
settings.content: Stay informed to real-time updates about market changes, news, and social media trends directly on their workspace. Its dynamic display enhances situational awareness and can serve as a customizable tool for monitoring financial data efficiently.

settings.title: Pixel Art Creation
settings.content: In addition to informative displays, you can showcase Pixelated Art Designs! Get creative with your own designs or explore over 1000+ captivating designs in our vibrant pixel art community on the Divoom app.

settings.title: The Perfect Gift
settings.content:
What could be a more perfect gift than a versatile, nostalgic display that lets you unleash your creativity?

With its customizable pixel art display, and practical functions, this device offers both entertainment and utility for individuals of all ages and interests.

Its innovative design seamlessly blends retro charm with modern technology, making it a distinctive and heartfelt gift option.

settings.title: How long will it take to ship my parcel(s)?
settings.content: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: I messed up my delivery address, what do I do?
settings.content: Reach Out To Mia @Divoom.Com Immediately Regarding The Error, We Will Change It For You. Just Email Us Your Full Name And Correct Address, We Will Update The Shipping Details For You.

settings.title: Do you ship worldwide?
settings.content: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.
